oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bobby Bare Interview by Bob Allen 1-24-80
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is an interview of Bobby Bare by Bob Allen. The interview takes place on 1-24-80.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bobby Bare;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Side One (0:00) -- Bob Allen asks Bobby Bare about his new live album. Bobby Bare mentions that it was recorded at CBS Studio A. (0:43) -- Bobby Bare mentions that the album was recorded live on 24-tracks. (1:35) -- Phone rings, Bobby Bare answers. (1:45) -- Tape resumes, Bobby Bare speaks about his upcoming promotion for his new album. (1:54) -- Bobby Bare speaks about changing managements from Bill Graham to Joe Sullivan. (2:33) -- Bobby Bare speaks favorably about Bill Graham. (3:40) -- Bobby Bare mentions that he is still very good friends with Bill Graham. (5:16) -- Bob Allen asks Bobby Bare about his album recording personnel. (6:24) -- Bob Allen asks Bobby Bare about the timeline of recording his most recent album. (8:44) -- Bobby Bare speaks about a second version of the song "Tequila Sheila." (9:21) -- Bob Allen asks Bobby Bare about Bob McDill's tune, "Crazy Again." Bobby Bare speaks about Bob McDill's recent writing habits. (9:40) -- Bobby Bare speaks about the song "Tecumseh Valley" by Townes Van Zandt. Bobby Bare goes on to describe his fondness for Townes' songwriting. (10:40) -- Bobby Bare speaks about working with Rodney Crowell and their fondness for the song "Tecumseh Valley" by Townes Van Zandt. (13:10) -- Bobby Bare speaks about finding Rodney Crowell's music through a cassette tape he listened to while researching music to record. (14:58) -- Bob Allen asks Bobby Bare about his producing endeavors and Chet Atkins' producing on his first songs. Bobby Bare explains that Chet Atkins left producing due to time constraints and the desire to play guitar full-time. (17:12) -- Bobby Bare speaks about first working with Chet Atkins. (19:22) -- Bobby Bare speaks about asking Bill Rice for producing help. (21:09) -- Bobby Bare speaks about his conversation with Jim Ed Norman (producer for The Eagles). (24:54) -- Bob Allen asks Bobby Bare about his future plans for his upcoming album and tour. (25:16) -- Bob Allen asks Bobby Bare about the success of the previous year. (26:56) -- Bob Allen asks Bobby Bare about whether his personal life encouraged him to pause his professional career.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bare, Bobby;
